communications.subject: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request: APF Agreements
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All MOUs, data sharing agreements, contracts and any other agreement documents between Georgia State University and the Atlanta Police Foundation that were active any time between 1/1/2018 and 7/17/2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

e

communications.subject: RE: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request: APF Agreements
communications.communication:
Good morning, :

I am writing to confirm receipt of your request.  We are currently working to determine if Georgia State University has any responsive documents and, if so, how long it will take to produce them.

I will provide an update shortly.

Kindly,
Megan A. Cappetto
Public Records Officer
Georgia State University
Office of Legal Affairs
Centennial Hall
100 Auburn Ave. Suite 315
Atlanta, GA 30303

communications.subject: RE: Georgia Open Records Act Request: Open Records Request: APF Agreements
communications.communication:
Good morning,

After an exhaustive search, Georgia State University found no documents responsive to your request.

Kindly,
Megan A. Cappetto
Public Records Officer
Georgia State University
Office of Legal Affairs
Centennial Hall
100 Auburn Ave. Suite 315
Atlanta, GA 30303
